participant_1.background:
I have a house with a large yard for my paps to hunt mushrooms.
my wife works as a diesel mechanic.
My work schedule is hectic and I have trouble staying in touch with my family.
i never knew my dad.
I have a journal that I've been writing in since I was a teenager

participant_2.background:
I have never been in a relationship because I prefer to spend my time with my cars.
I need to find a way to advertise my juicing bar to people in my neighborhood.
I sometimes have problems with my coordination, but I'm working on it.
My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.
i am divorced and looking to date.

content.text: Hello there! How are you today?
Hey there, not too bad! How about you?
Doing great thanks! Just got back from running some errands, and now I'm relaxing with a cup of coffee.
That sounds nice, I'm actually working on some art right now.
Oh that's awesome! What kind of art do you do?
I'm a painter, I mainly do abstracts and landscapes.
Wow, that's really cool! I've always been interested in painting, but I'm not very good at it.
Well everyone has to start somewhere! You should definitely keep trying, it's a really rewarding hobby.
Thanks, I might just do that! What's your favorite thing about painting?
I love the way I can express myself through my work. It's a really therapeutic process for me.
That's really great! I'm glad you have something that helps you relax and de-stress.
Yeah, it's definitely important to have something like that in your life.
So what do you do for work?
I actually own a juicing bar in my neighborhood.
Oh that's really cool! How long have you had it for?
About a year now, it's been going really well.
That's great to hear! I've always wanted to try juicing, but I've never really had the time.
Well you should definitely come by sometime! I'll give you a free sample.
Thanks, I might just do that
